data.name: GetArtistsByGenre
data.value:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX sco: <http://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistName min(?g) WHERE {{ VALUES ?type {{ sco:MusicGroup dbo:MusicalArtist }} ?artist a ?type . ?artist rdfs:label ?artistName. ?artist dbo:genre ?genre . ?genre rdfs:label ?g .
FILTER (lang(?artistName) = 'en') . FILTER({0}) }} GROUP BY ?artist ?artistName ORDER BY ?artistName LIMIT 100

data.name: GetCountriesOfEurope
GetGenresByArtist
GetSongByNameAndArtistName
SearchArtistByNameAndWebsite
SearchArtistsByCountry
SearchArtistsByLabel
data.value: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?artist ?artistName WHERE {{ VALUES ?type {{ schema:MusicGroup dbo:MusicalArtist }} ?artist a ?type . ?artist rdfs:label ?artistName. FILTER(CONTAINS(LCASE(STR(?artistName)), '{0}')) . FILTER(lang(?artistName) = 'en') }} GROUP BY ?artist ?artistName ORDER BY ?artistName LIMIT 20
